rule: The <strong> and <em> tags must be used to emphasize key words and phrases.
input: Hope belongs to the hopeful. Faith secures the future. Love conquers all.
validityText:
The input given is "Hope belongs to the hopeful. Faith secures the future. Love conquers all." Based on the input specification, I will evaluate whether this input is valid. 

First, the input should be a paragraph of text. This input can be considered a paragraph as it is a collection of sentences grouped together.

Second, the input text must contain at least three separate sentences. This input contains three sentences: "Hope belongs to the hopeful.", "Faith secures the future.", and "Love conquers all.", which meets the requirement.

Third, the input can include any combination of letters, numbers, symbols, and punctuation. The input includes letters and punctuation, which is compliant with this rule.

Lastly, the input text should not consist solely of whitespace characters. The input contains actual text with no exclusively whitespace characters, satisfying this condition.

After analyzing the input according to the given specifications, I find no violations. All the rules are adhered to and the input specification is met.

OK
coverageText:

```html
Faith secures the future.

Love conquers all.

```

Given these observations, the output follows all the requirements specified in the chatbot description. There are no violations of the description seen, and thus, the output is in compliance.
